clip_assessment.verbatim_quote: When you're calling your database, are you asking for money or are you handing out gold bars?
clip_assessment.guest_voice: Chase uses direct, conversational language with vivid metaphors and rhetorical questions. He teaches through contrast and challenges listeners to examine their own behavior.
clip_assessment.why_this_stops_scrolls: It exposes the uncomfortable truth that most agents are takers disguised as relationship-builders, and offers a specific mental model to flip the script.

HOOK.text: Your database doesn't answer because they know you're calling to take, not give.
HOOK.production_note: Text on screen: 'Your database knows.' Cut to Chase mid-sentence, intense eye contact.

SETUP.text: Chase Craig — two billion in sales, six thousand transactions — says most agents have this backwards. And it's killing their conversion. Here's what he means.
SETUP.production_note: Quick B-roll of phone screen with unanswered calls. Chase's stats appear as text overlays.

INSIGHT.text: He asks: When you're calling your database, are you asking for money or are you handing out gold bars? Most agents call when they need a deal. They ask about timing. They pitch their services. That's asking for money. Handing out gold bars? That's calling with a market update they can't get anywhere else. A off-market property that fits their criteria. Intel on their neighborhood. Value first. Always.
INSIGHT.production_note: Split screen: 'Asking for Money' vs 'Handing Out Gold Bars' with examples under each. Cut back to Chase delivering the metaphor with hand gestures.

REFRAME.text: When you become the person who gives gold bars, your database starts answering. Because they want what you have. Not because they feel guilty ignoring you.
REFRAME.production_note: Close-up of Chase. Text overlay: 'They want what you have.' Cut to visual of phone ringing, being answered.

CTA.text: So before your next database call — write down the gold bar you're giving. If you can't name it, don't make the call yet. Go find the gold first.
CTA.production_note: Chase pointing at camera. Final frame: 'Find the gold first.' Show notepad with 'My Gold Bar:' written at top.

caption: Stop asking for money. Start handing out gold bars. Your database will know the difference.
